details:
adjective
- located far away spatially
= example: located far away spatially
= synonyms: remote
- separate or apart in time
= example: separate or apart in time
= synonyms: remote
- separated in space or coming from or going to a distance
= example: separated in space or coming from or going to a distance
- far apart in relevance or relationship or kinship
= example: far apart in relevance or relationship or kinship
= synonyms: remote
- remote in manner
= synonyms: aloof
